title: Ep - 168 - SONJA MORGAN FROM REAL HOUSEWIVES OF NEW YORK
description:
Sonja Morgan from Real Housewives of New York discusses her life before Bravo, how the show has changed her life, her relationship with Harry Dubin, why viewers relate to the cast of their season, and whether she ever feels the pressure to look perfect on television. 


Actor Doug Budin helps Kate review sMothered on TLC, which follows four outrageous mother/daughter duos who take their bonds to the extreme. 


Radio Andy Host John Hill reviews the new show 90 Day Fiance: The Other Way on TLC, which is about Americans facing the challenge of relocating internationally for love. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey
